Package com.example.quoridor.data.game.lobby

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
com.example.quoridor.data.game.lobby.Lobby
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.os.Parcelable
public class Lobby extends Object implements android.os.Parcelable
Class that handles a networked game lobby with the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby(String uuid, String username, ErrorOutputter exceptions, LoadingController loadingController)
      Constructor for the lobby, used for CREATING a new lobby.
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID of client player
      username - Username of client player
      exceptions - error handler interface that deals with notifications from the server
      loadingController - loading controller interface that informs when the lobby is retrieving data

    • Lobby

      public Lobby(String uuid, String session, String username, ErrorOutputter exceptions, LoadingController loadingController)
      Constructor for the lobby, used for JOINING an existing lobby.
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID of client player
      username - Username of client player
      session - session of lobby that you are trying to join
      exceptions - error handler interface that deals with notifications from the server
      loadingController - loading controller interface that informs when the lobby is retrieving data

    • Lobby

      protected Lobby(android.os.Parcel in)

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()

    • getSettings

      public org.json.JSONObject getSettings()
      Used to get the settings for the lobby, if active.
      Returns:
      JSON object containing all of the current settings

    • is4PlayerGame

      public boolean is4PlayerGame()
      Used to determine whether the game is 4 player or not.
      Returns:
      true=4player, false=2player

    • waiting

      public boolean waiting()
      Function to determine whether the lobby is still active(i.e. still waiting for the game to start)
      Returns:
      true=lobbyActive, false=lobbyInactive

    • getLobbyState

      public int getLobbyState()
      Retrieves the current lobby state.
      Returns:
      integer representing lobby state 0=gameStarted 1=lobbyWaiting 2=kickedETC.

    • getPlayers

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
      Returns:
      Arraylist of players currently waiting in the lobby.

    • kickPlayer

      public void kickPlayer(int playerNumber)

    • leaveLobby

      public void leaveLobby()

    • changeSettings

      public void changeSettings(org.json.JSONObject newSettings)
      Parameters:
      newSettings - JSON object with all of the new settings

    • changeSetting

      public void changeSetting(String key, int value)
      Changes a single setting in the settings object, and submits the change to the server.
      Parameters:
      key - the name of the settings
      value - the value of the setting

    • startGame

      public void startGame()

    • init

      public void init()
      Pulls all new player and settings data from the server.

    • findClientPlayer

      public int findClientPlayer()
      Simple function to find which player in the player array represents the local player.
      Returns:
      index of the local client player

    • amHost

      public boolean amHost()
      Simple function to determine whether the client is the lobby host.
      Returns:
      true=amHost false=notHost
